Assert if the predicate fails and use a subset of the supplied message.

account to be notified

accounts to be notified
action.code is also considered as part of the set of notified accounts

detaileddescription.para: Checks if a transaction is authorized by a provided set of keys and permissions

parameterdescription.para: - pointer to the start of the serialized transaction
- size (in bytes) of the serialized transaction
- pointer to the start of the serialized vector of provided public keys
- size (in bytes) of serialized vector of provided public keys (can be 0 if no public keys are to be provided)
- pointer to the start of the serialized vector of provided permissions (empty permission name acts as wildcard)
- size (in bytes) of the serialized vector of provided permissions

simplesect.para: 1 if the transaction is authorized, 0 otherwise

memberdef.name: check_permission_authorization

detaileddescription.para: Checks if a permission is authorized by a provided delay and a provided set of keys and permissions

parameterdescription.para: - the account owner of the permission
- the name of the permission to check for authorization
- pointer to the start of the serialized vector of provided public keys
- size (in bytes) of serialized vector of provided public keys (can be 0 if no public keys are to be provided)
- pointer to the start of the serialized vector of provided permissions (empty permission name acts as wildcard)
- size (in bytes) of the serialized vector of provided permissions
- the provided delay in microseconds (cannot exceed INT64_MAX)

simplesect.para: 1 if the permission is authorized, 0 otherwise

- the set of public keys which have authorized the transaction

simplesect.para: whether the transaction was authorized by provided keys and permissions

detaileddescription.para: Proposes a schedule change using the legacy producer key format

simplesect.para: Once the block that contains the proposal becomes irreversible, the schedule is promoted to "pending" automatically. Once the block that promotes the schedule is irreversible, the schedule will become "active"
an optional value of the version of the new proposed schedule if successful

detaileddescription.para: Proposes a schedule change using the more flexible key format

simplesect.para: Once the block that contains the proposal becomes irreversible, the schedule is promoted to "pending" automatically. Once the block that promotes the schedule is irreversible, the schedule will become "active"
an optional value of the version of the new proposed schedule if successful

detaileddescription.para: This method will abort execution of wasm without failing the contract. This is used to bypass all cleanup / destructors that would normally be called.
<html>

para.bold: WARNING: this method will immediately abort execution of wasm code that is on the stack and would be executed as the method normally returned. Problems can occur with write-caches, RAII, reference counting when this method aborts execution of wasm code immediately.

detaileddescription.para: </html>
